name: RingCentral
description: Integrate with RingCentral to send, list, get and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Send Sms
tools.description: Send an SMS message via RingCentral. Requires the sender extension phone number and recipient number.

tools.name: List Extensions
tools.description: List extensions (users, departments, IVR menus) on the RingCentral account.

tools.name: Get Call Log
tools.description: Retrieve the call log for the authenticated user or account. Filter by type, direction, and date range.

tools.name: Send Fax
tools.description: Send a fax via RingCentral. Provide the recipient fax number and text content to fax.
